entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Forillon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:49 a.m. EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gaspé Airport 9:00 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

Humidity: 68 %

entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then rain at times heavy. Amount 5 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 6. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
